outputs.output_descr: The Expanded BAACH project is a model for public-private collaboration to reduce hunger and foster economic empowerment using irrigation based solutions that can be replicated or scaled.  This project is built on the successes of the pilot project in Siaya and has been scaled to larger Siaya, Bungoma, Muranga and Yatta districts.  It leverages learning's and best practices and creates synergies that combine power and capacity for implementation and scale.

project_descr: Expanded Business Alliance against Chronic Hunger project
